
## Class : pharyngeal mucosa

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0000355
 * *Label* = pharyngeal mucosa
 * *Definition* = A mucosa that is part of a pharynx [Automatically generated definition]. [ [database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md) = OBOL:automatic ]
